{{cpp/regex/match_results/title|size}}
{{cpp/regex/match_results/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
size_type size() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the number of submatches, i.e. {{c|std::distance(begin(), end())}}.

Returns {{c|0}} if {{c|*this}} does not represent the result of a successful match.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The number of submatches.

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;regex&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;

int main()
{
    std::regex re("a(a)*b");
    std::string target("aaab");
    std::smatch sm;

    std::cout &lt;&lt; sm.size() &lt;&lt; '\n';

    std::regex_match(target, sm, re);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; sm.size() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
0
2
}}
